header_text: You enjoy walking to the thrift store occasionally. On your most recent trip, you turned on the wrong street and had to retrace your steps. This made you worried.

elements.text: You remember that you go there pretty infrequently and that you can always use your phone or print directions to get there. Your worry lessens and your outlook...
